text: he imanavala'o! (Jangali) sikarane katala na karo, jyare ke tame aheramani sthitimam hova (hajja athava umaraha mate) ane je vyakti tamara manthi tene jani jo'ine katala karase to tena para phidayaha jaruri che, je katala karela janavara barabara hovum jo'i'e, jeno nirnaya tamara manthi be bharosapatra vyakti kari de, bhalene te phidayo khasa prakarana dhora hoya, je kurabani mate ka'aba sariphamam la'i javata hoya, ane bhalene kaphpharo lacarone api devamam ave ane bhalene tena barabara rojha rakhi levamam ave, jethi pote karela karyano svada cakhe, allaha ta'ala'e pachala papane mapha kari didha ane je vyakti phari avum ja karase, to allaha badalo lese, ane allaha badalo levamam jabaradasta che
